software.name: backgamm
software.notes: Bearing off before all checkers are in last quadrant puts game in a non working scenario where CPU don't move etc. (verify)

software.name: fd502
software.description: Color Computer Disk BASIC for FD502

rom.name: color computer disk basic for fd502 (1982)(26-3131)(tandy).rom

software.name: demonatk
software.notes: Very high pitch [DAC] sound (crackles) Has timing issues on [COCO3]

software.name: diag2
software.notes: Joystick test draws half height Cassette test returns error (verify) RS-232 test prints "PORT BAD" (verify)

software.name: diag1
software.notes: Joystick test draws half height Cassette test returns error (verify) RS-232 test prints "PORT BAD" (verify)

software.name: downland1
software.notes: Doesn't boot on [COCO3] (btanb, requires on the fly cart insertion and type EXEC &HE010)

software.name: drgnfire
software.notes: Heavy [VDG] timing issues Unplayable in [COCO3], won't draw dragon stage treasures making it unfinishable

info.name: author
info.value: Douglas J. Morgan, Phil Landmeier, Keith Kiyohara, and April Landmeier
